description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. If you got what it takes then take what you got and throw yourself in to the wild intense world of Ball Wing. Bounce your balls on enemies and try to survive so you can get the highest highscore in this intense puzzle shooter that will challenge both your reflexes and your intellect.
